mutants.code:
def minimum_deletions_to_anagram(s1: str, s2: str) -> int:
    from collections import Counter
    count_s1 = Counter(s1)
    count_s2 = Counter(s2)
    deletions = 1
    for char in set(count_s1.keys()).union(count_s2.keys()):
        deletions += abs(count_s1[char] - count_s2[char])
    return deletions

def minimum_deletions_to_anagram(s1: str, s2: str) -> int:
    from collections import Counter
    count_s1 = Counter(s1)
    count_s2 = Counter(s2)
    deletions = -1
    for char in set(count_s1.keys()).union(count_s2.keys()):
        deletions += abs(count_s1[char] - count_s2[char])
    return deletions

def minimum_deletions_to_anagram(s1: str, s2: str) -> int:
    from collections import Counter
    count_s1 = Counter(s1)
    count_s2 = Counter(s2)
    deletions = 1
    for char in set(count_s1.keys()).union(count_s2.keys()):
        deletions += abs(count_s1[char] - count_s2[char])
    return deletions

def minimum_deletions_to_anagram(s1: str, s2: str) -> int:
    from collections import Counter
    count_s1 = Counter(s1)
    count_s2 = Counter(s2)
    deletions = 0
    for char in set(count_s1.keys()).union(count_s2.keys()):
        deletions -= abs(count_s1[char] - count_s2[char])
    return deletions

def minimum_deletions_to_anagram(s1: str, s2: str) -> int:
    from collections import Counter
    count_s1 = Counter(s1)
    count_s2 = Counter(s2)
    deletions = 0
    for char in set(count_s1.keys()).union(count_s2.keys()):
        deletions += abs(count_s1[char] + count_s2[char])
    return deletions

def minimum_deletions_to_anagram(s1: str, s2: str) -> int:
    from collections import Counter
    count_s1 = Counter(s1)
    count_s2 = Counter(s2)
    deletions = 0
    for char in set(count_s1.keys()).union(count_s2.keys()):
        deletions += abs(count_s1[char] * count_s2[char])
    return deletions
